name: intricately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has a lot of small parts that are arranged in a complicated or delicate way: an intricately engraved pendant
in a way that has many complicated details and is therefore difficult to understand: The hijacking operation was intricately planned. See
intricate
More examplesFewer examplesintricately carved pillars made of ancient wood Morning frost highlights the intricately formed seed heads. Stonehenge is an intricately planned arrangement of huge stones.The book is intricately plotted and smartly written.These details show how intricately slavery was woven into the country's economy.
